name: Makemap
body:
Make Map
========

Tool to do simple map extractions from WMS.

### Authors and Contributors
* Developed by Scott Macfarlane (@cheeseblok) , Will Fisher (@teknofire) and Jason Grimes (@grimm) 
* Developed for the AlaskaView and AlaskaMapped projects by GINA
* Geographic Information Network of Alaska (GINA)
  * http://www.gina.alaska.edu
  * http://www.alaskamapped.org
  * http://www.americaview.org

Description
-----------

OpenLayers based map tool that lets you draw a box on a map, pick extraction size, and name of extraction, and which WMS layer to extract from - boom you got a geotiff.

Getting it running
------------------

```
$ git clone # 
# cd into it
$ git submodule init
$ git submodule update
$ bundle install # install dependancies
$ rake tmp:create

# setup the database - for simple SQLITE devel mode:
$ cp config/database.yml.example config/database.yml
$ rake db:migrate

# launch and test
$ rackup 
```

License
-------

See LICENSE file for licensing and credits.  Think BSD/MIT.

Support or Contact
------------------

Just ping any of the developers at GINA for assistance.
tagline: Web tool to quickly make a map
